price: Hikima kaamili; lakini maonyo hayafai kitu!
footnotes: Haya yaliyo wajia ni hikima kubwa na lengo la kufikia mbali. Lakini maonyo yataleta faida gani kwa wanao zipinga hikima hizo?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
